attributes.action: We want a national referendum on whether or not to stay a member of the European Union.
attributes.additional_details: E.U membership is a major issue which effects the lives of everyone in the U.K. Having been a member in the E.U for some time now, many are unhappy with how it has changed the lives of people in our country. Its time we reviewed if the voting public still feel its in our nations best interest to maintain our membership in the E.U by putting it to a national referendum.
